client_profile: Family looking to buy an apartment in Brussels. Budget is 700000–1205000 EUR, prioritizing residential areas, parks, and cafes.
must_have: Access to parks and green areas
red_flags: High noise levels in certain areas
Expensive property taxes in some districts
contradictions: High prices in premium areas might limit space
Quiet neighborhoods may be farther from cafes
Family-friendly areas may have high demand

top_districts.name: Ixelles

microhoods.name: Flagey
microhoods.why: Flagey features a vibrant café scene surrounding the iconic lake. It's a great area for families with activities available.
microhoods.watch_out: Community events can lead to high noise levels during weekends.

microhoods.name: Parc Tenbosch
microhoods.why: Parc Tenbosch provides ample green space, ideal for children and outdoor activities. Family-friendly environment is prevalent.
microhoods.watch_out: Limited public transport options may extend commute times.

microhoods.name: Avenue Louise
microhoods.why: Avenue Louise is known for its premium shopping and dining options. It offers a lively atmosphere with accessible amenities.
microhoods.watch_out: High traffic can affect the tranquility of living.

why: Offers a blend of residential comfort and lively cafes.
Parks nearby encourage outdoor activities for families.
watch_out: Expect higher living costs near popular cafes and parks.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles

microhoods.name: Avenue du Midi
microhoods.why: The area has several green spots and playgrounds, making it family-friendly. Proximity to public transport is also good.
microhoods.watch_out: Busier streets can be noisy during peak hours.

microhoods.name: Parc de la Petite Senne
microhoods.why: Offers a serene environment with family amenities and playgrounds. Good access to park activities for kids.
microhoods.watch_out: Some apartments can be older with potential maintenance issues.

microhoods.name: Place Maurice
microhoods.why: Diverse range of cafes enhances local lifestyle options. Great for family brunch outings and social gatherings.
microhoods.watch_out: Parking can be limited in busy brunch hours.

why: Known for its vibrant community and numerous parks.
Offers a balance between urban life and family-friendly spaces.
watch_out: Higher noise levels in busy areas.
